Title: Establishes a sales tax holiday for various products for the period commencing on Black Friday and ending after Christmas day
Summary: Establishes a sales tax exemption for certain products purchased for less than five hundred dollars commencing on the fourth Friday in November and ending on the twenty-sixth day of December.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a sales tax holiday for various products for the period commencing on Black Friday and ending after Christmas day
